description: This file defines a REST controller for user management in a Spring Boot application, providing endpoints for creating, retrieving, and listing users.

classes.name: UserController
classes.description: REST controller managing user-related endpoints, including user creation, retrieval by ID, and listing all users.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Handles HTTP POST requests to create a new user.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Handles HTTP GET requests to retrieve a user by their ID.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Handles HTTP GET requests to list all registered users.
